If the storage of this app gets deleted, all data is lost and the app may behave incorrect. 

The app needs the permission "set alarm" and "execute after boot completed" to create correct notifications. 

The app needs the permission "change or delete external storage" and "read external storage" to import or export data when you want it. The app will never do this automatically. 

No responsibility will be accepted if the app displays notifications incorrectly or not.

What\'s the purpose of this app?

I developed this app to be more independent from other services. I realized that I do not want to forget my roommate's birthday just because he deleted his account in a certain social network, which would otherwise have indicated his birthday. 
Furthermore I wanted a simple service, no integrated calendar services that for the most part have additional features I do not use. And I wanted a service that by no means passes on data to third parties or transfers data over the Internet. 

This app is really simple and does not have the possibility to access the Internet. Everything is stored on your smartphone.
The app does not notify me. Why?
In some cases the app does not create a notification for you. There is a range of different possible reasons and solutions for this problem:

Make sure that the application has all the needed permissions to create alarms and notifications. To check that, open the Settings, navigate to Applications/Application Manager, open the settings for this particular app and check the permissions.

For this app to even try to create notifications, notifications must be set to active in the notification settings of this app. To do that, open the notification settings in the menu in the upper right corner in the overview screen of this app.

It may be that the alarms and notifications do not work while your smartphone is idle, in power-saving mode, or something similar. To review that, check the power saving options and the notification options in the Settings of your smartphone.
Since there are regular updates to this app and to the Android Operating System, you should always make sure to have the newest version of this app and the Android Operating System installed.
You can restart your smartphone. After that, all the alarms get recreated.

If all these suggestions do not solve the issue, then unfortunately I can not help you. I am trying everything to eliminate other reasons that may be responsible for this issue. Please consider not to rate this app bad just because the notifications do not appear. However, I am very happy if you provide me with constructive critic.
